column2: The Pagan Pantheons remain the stuff of legend.
The Pagan Pantheons will be landed in historically relevant areas.
§Y(Recommended)§! Silly Easter Eggs and references will be disabled.
Easter Eggs are enabled - references are random, vague, and most likely confusing, however, they are still incredibly rare.
Suspicion is hidden for extra challenge.
Suspicion is always known to supernatural characters.
